message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm offering it to you at $15,000. I think you'll be very pleased with this investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is significantly below the value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This offer reflects the true worth of what I'm offering.
I understand the product has value, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
